attributes.additional_details:
Wandsworth blights Vauxhall with two tall towers to replace Market Towers, but more than twice as high - at 58 storeys (200 m) high the tallest will cast a long shadow over Vauxhall Park and the surrounding areas.

Planning consent was given two days before the advertised date.

We the undersigned protest against Wandsworth Council's decision to give planning permission to the One Nine Elms development, because the process was undemocratic and the views of the local community were not properly represented.

We ask the Secretary of State to call in the planning decision for One Nine Elms.
